replies.msg:
There’re a couple of issues in your recommendation.

Firstly, outsourcing is not an ideal solution to replace all IT staff especially managerial positions. Staff competency, cultural difference (managing users’ expectations) and efficiency are the common issues when using outsourcing services.

Also, monitoring activities are considered as measures to detect errors. It will not be effective if the majority of the your work are with quality issues.

IT Auditing is treated as third line of defenses rather than helping IT function proactively. Otherwise, independence would be an issue to them.
